| HistoryText             = A former [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] black-ops team developed by [[Brent Jackson (Earth-616)|Agent Brent Jackson]], Contingency was trained to assassinate known mutant adventurers should they turn on the public. After going rogue they fought [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]], [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and [[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Warbird]]. All but [[Rapture (Contingency) (Earth-616)|Rapture]] were arrested.{{r|Wolverine/Captain America #1}}
